quest.name: Trouble on the Road
journal: Aeluuin is concerned for the well-being of one of his customers.
A young woman who has reserved a room at the Bobbing Cork has yet to arrive, and Aeluuin fears the worst. Seek out the woman and see to her safety.
You have dispatched the fiend that was threatening the young adventurer. Speak with her and calm her nerves.
The young adventurer offers her thanks; she was so taken with the scenery that she failed to notice the fiend's presence. Return to the Bobbing Cork and assure Aeluuin that his customer is safe.

Aeluuin is relieved for your tidings. What with fearsome rumors circulating of late, he feels ever more responsible for his customers' safety. He will prepare a warm bed and hot meal for the girl, that she might forget her ordeal.

dialogue.name: AELUUIN
dialogue.text: Just look at the time! Whatever is keeping her? ...My apologies, friend. You've caught me in a fretful humour. A young girl has reserved a room with me tonight, yet she's nowhere to be found.

dialogue.name: AELUUIN
dialogue.text: There're ill rumors about these parts of late─try as I might, I can't help but fear the worst. Might you be so kind as to go check if she's well?

dialogue.name: ADVENTURE
dialogue.text: Beautiful sights to be seen in these parts, yes? It's a shame that the dangers are too great to truly enjoy them...

dialogue.name: ADVENTURE
dialogue.text: Thank you, friend! Why, I thought I was done for!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURE
dialogue.text: One moment, I was standing here enjoying the scenery while my chocobo enjoyed a much-deserved nap, and the next...

dialogue.name: ADVENTURE
dialogue.text: It sends shivers down my spine just to recall it. Anyroad, please thank the innkeep for his concern, and tell him I will be on my way as soon as my bird awakes.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURE
dialogue.text: Please thank the innkeep for his concern, and tell him I will be on my way as soon as my bird awakes...though he is a rather heavy sleeper, I fear.

dialogue.name: AELUUIN
dialogue.text: The girl's safe? Thank you, friend─those are the best tidings I've received all day. And here I'd feared the worst...

dialogue.name: AELUUIN
dialogue.text: Why, if she'd ended up in the clutches of that masked... But I mustn't think such ill thoughts. Now, if you'll excuse me, I'd best get back to work─something tells me the girl'll be needing a warm bed and a hot meal more than ever.
